action.primary: Cleares Heat, cools the Blood, invigorates the Blood, breaks up Blood Stasis and resolves toxicity

indications: Lung Heat with cough, trauma, pain from Blood Stasis, toxic sores, irregular menses, vaginal discharge, rheumatism, Internal and External injuries from impacts, hemoptysis, metrorrhagia, bronchitis, inflammation of the pelvic area, dysentery caused by amoebic infection, bleeding from external injuries, scrofula

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Yin-type boils.
